text: @Indy_CIO reports that his agency has cut $3.5M in its budget since 2016, while increasing customer satisfaction ratings from 73% to 90%
text_html: @Indy_CIO reports that his agency has cut $3.5M in its budget since 2016, while increasing customer satisfaction ratings from 73% to 90%

text: In response to a question from @JeffersonShreve, @Indy_CIO reports that significant funding for Community Justice Campus technology has been built into the bond issue for that project and is consequently not built into his department's 2020 budget

text: An exciting Information Technology Board meeting this morning! ISA just received approval to migrate and modernize the City/County data center. Thankful for the hard work from our team and the opportunity to make these tremendous improvements!
text_html: An exciting Information Technology Board meeting this morning! ISA just received approval to migrate and modernize the City/County data center. Thankful for the hard work from our team and the opportunity to make these tremendous improvements!

text: "Were going to move from a government organized by its own interests, to a government organized by the interests of its residents". - @GoldsmithOnGovpic.twitter.com/2spIBS0vbj

text: Great insight from @Indy_CIO!
text_html: Great insight from @Indy_CIO!

text: @Indy_CIO I just heard your podcast on @GovLovePodcast.  I too graduated from @USIedu @AlumniUSI, was also a Journalism major and was impacted along the same lines as you by a Journalism professor. "Don't let your degree determine your career, let it help drive your career."
text_html: @Indy_CIO I just heard your podcast on @GovLovePodcast. I too graduated from @USIedu @AlumniUSI, was also a Journalism major and was impacted along the same lines as you by a Journalism professor. "Don't let your degree determine your career, let it help drive your career."

From the @GovLovePodcast studio: @Indy_CIO @ShiftIndy shares how he got buy-in for a new website, the work that went into bringing it into the 21st century, and how to modernize your organization's website. https://elgl.org/podcast-the-future-of-government-websites-with-ken-clark-indianapolis-in/ …pic.twitter.com/1NBcxGFLIZ

text: Today with @IMPD_Chief, @SPEA_Indy, @Indy_CIO & community leaders, we announced a pilot program testing body-worn cameras for @IMPDnews.  The body cameras study will be rolled out across multiple districts and will involve input from officers & residents. https://www.indystar.com/story/news/crime/2019/02/04/body-cameras-indianapolis-police-launch-pilot-program/2770994002/ …
text_html: Today with @IMPD_Chief, @SPEA_Indy, @Indy_CIO & community leaders, we announced a pilot program testing body-worn cameras for @IMPDnews. The body cameras study will be rolled out across multiple districts and will involve input from officers & residents. https://www.indystar.com/story/news/crime/2019/02/04/body-cameras-indianapolis-police-launch-pilot-program/2770994002/ …

text: Google Search Update: We’ve been hearing from a lot of folks that Google isn’t providing the right results for their searches. They’re 100% correct. When you reduce your site by 60% and conduct a complete apples-to-oranges transition, it takes a bit for Google to catch-up.
text_html: Google Search Update: We’ve been hearing from a lot of folks that Google isn’t providing the right results for their searches. They’re 100% correct. When you reduce your site by 60% and conduct a complete apples-to-oranges transition, it takes a bit for Google to catch-up.

text: CIO...someone who thought themselves better at the politics of an organisation, than at IT.  Really they need to be outstanding in their understanding of IT, but the CIO roles tend to be better conduits to IT from "the business", than enabling the geeks to achieve.
text_html: CIO...someone who thought themselves better at the politics of an organisation, than at IT. Really they need to be outstanding in their understanding of IT, but the CIO roles tend to be better conduits to IT from "the business", than enabling the geeks to achieve.

text_html: Great insight from @Indy_CIO!

text: @Indy_CIO I just heard your podcast on @GovLovePodcast.  I too graduated from @USIedu @AlumniUSI, was also a Journalism major and was impacted along the same lines as you by a Journalism professor. "Don't let your degree determine your career, let it help drive your career."
text_html: @Indy_CIO I just heard your podcast on @GovLovePodcast. I too graduated from @USIedu @AlumniUSI, was also a Journalism major and was impacted along the same lines as you by a Journalism professor. "Don't let your degree determine your career, let it help drive your career."

From the @GovLovePodcast studio: @Indy_CIO @ShiftIndy shares how he got buy-in for a new website, the work that went into bringing it into the 21st century, and how to modernize your organization's website. https://elgl.org/podcast-the-future-of-government-websites-with-ken-clark-indianapolis-in/ …pic.twitter.com/1NBcxGFLIZ

text: Today with @IMPD_Chief, @SPEA_Indy, @Indy_CIO & community leaders, we announced a pilot program testing body-worn cameras for @IMPDnews.  The body cameras study will be rolled out across multiple districts and will involve input from officers & residents. https://www.indystar.com/story/news/crime/2019/02/04/body-cameras-indianapolis-police-launch-pilot-program/2770994002/ …
text_html: Today with @IMPD_Chief, @SPEA_Indy, @Indy_CIO & community leaders, we announced a pilot program testing body-worn cameras for @IMPDnews. The body cameras study will be rolled out across multiple districts and will involve input from officers & residents. https://www.indystar.com/story/news/crime/2019/02/04/body-cameras-indianapolis-police-launch-pilot-program/2770994002/ …

text: Google Search Update: We’ve been hearing from a lot of folks that Google isn’t providing the right results for their searches. They’re 100% correct. When you reduce your site by 60% and conduct a complete apples-to-oranges transition, it takes a bit for Google to catch-up.
text_html: Google Search Update: We’ve been hearing from a lot of folks that Google isn’t providing the right results for their searches. They’re 100% correct. When you reduce your site by 60% and conduct a complete apples-to-oranges transition, it takes a bit for Google to catch-up.

text: CIO...someone who thought themselves better at the politics of an organisation, than at IT.  Really they need to be outstanding in their understanding of IT, but the CIO roles tend to be better conduits to IT from "the business", than enabling the geeks to achieve.
text_html: CIO...someone who thought themselves better at the politics of an organisation, than at IT. Really they need to be outstanding in their understanding of IT, but the CIO roles tend to be better conduits to IT from "the business", than enabling the geeks to achieve.

text:
April 7

Indy CIO Network for an ALL-Community IT Virtual Meeting. Panelists from UnitedHealthOne, Republic Airways, Countrymark, the Indianapolis Public Schools, the Indy CIO Network, about leadership challenges and successes during  COVID.

https://pos.li/2fc30r pic.twitter.com/pcwWfOtCpX

text:
Last week, some of our team attended Indy CIO Network’s ‘Innovation Celebration Event’.

We heard from leaders in the healthcare, retail, service, agriculture and technology fields.

It is important to constantly be learning to push #innovation in our community!

#jointheflockpic.twitter.com/dYYHBh7XIQ
